head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MILBERT, ARTHUR H., MD.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MILBERT, ARTHUR H., MD.

block.p: MILBERT-Arthur H., MD. On September 29, 2000. Prominent Urological Surgeon of North Bergen, NJ. Dear uncle of William Mauskopf. Great Uncle of Eric and Susan. Cherished brother of the late Ann Wiener, Edith Mauskopf, and Joseph Milbert. Graveside services will be held on Wednesday, October 4, 2000 at 2:30 PM at Riversville Cemetery, Glenville, CT. For information contact: Menorah Chapels at Millburn, 2950 Vauxhall Road, Union, NJ.
